## Quick start

To speed calculation we need a parallel structure, (or very few genes):

```{r simple_start, collapse = TRUE}
library("BioCor")
library("foreach")
library("doParallel")
registerDoParallel(2)
# GO still gives problems sometimes
genes.id <- as.character(c(52, 11342, 80895, 57654, 58493, 1164, 1163, 4150, 
                           2130, 159))
similarities <- bioCor(genes.id, kegg = TRUE, react = TRUE, go = FALSE)
stopImplicitCluster()
similarities
```
Now in similarity we have a list of matrices of `r ncol(similarities[[1]])` rows and columns.
